explanation: [0-0] A young man wearing an orange jacket and a pink hat is sitting in front of a table, holding a mobile phone in his hands and looking at the screen. There is a piece of blue cloth under the table, and a light pink wall behind.
[0-2] Then the camera zooms out, and a girl in turquoise clothes pops her head out from behind the table, standing behind the man.
